overview: It is the Pleasure That you Cannot Deny, Once you Experienced it. A Virtuous Young Wife Experiences Ecstatic SEX, Breaking her Morality!! One day her Husband Handed out a Cream, she Then Reached her Orgasm for the First Time from a SEX she has Never Experienced Before. A Swirling Vortex of Pleasure Makes her Feel Dizzy. It was the Experience That Changed her Ordinary Life..."Where did it go Wrong...I was Happy Then. I Cannot go Back to my Ordinary Life..."
title: Young Wife Under Aphrodisiacs
